items.content: Reach For Youth was founded with a mission to advocate for youth rights and provide a voice for young people in Central Indiana.
Expanded services to include mental health counseling and family support programs, recognizing the holistic needs of youth and families.
Launched Teen Court program, pioneering restorative justice approaches that provide alternatives to traditional juvenile justice and reduce recidivism.
Deepened community partnerships with schools, courts, and agencies to create a comprehensive support network for youth across Central Indiana.
Now serving 800+ youth annually with evidence-based mental health services, restorative justice programs, and prevention education that transform lives and strengthen communities.
